backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, admin bootstrap via hardcoded credentials, access control checks, system user counters, and contact form submission types with permission-gated operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing implemented admin-only contact submissions page, legacy route aliasing, involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files, detailing routing, UI components, content files, hooks, styles, and configuration.
frontend/.env.production.example: Example production environment file noting that no environment variables are currently required.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base and custom OKLCH color variables defining theming for light and dark modes across the app.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document that preloads the hero background image and mounts the frontend React application.
frontend/PRODUCTION_CONFIGURATION.md: Documentation explaining production admin access flow, contact form spam protection, data storage rules, and deployment checklist.
frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Placeholder deployment notes file for production version 33 with no specific content.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION.md: Smoke test checklist describing landing page validation, offer route loading behavior, and contact form functionality tests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with lazy‑loaded offer and admin pages and renders the router provider.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Displays an access‑denied screen that handles Internet Identity login and fallback admin credential entry.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactF: Implements a contact form with validation, bot detection, and submission handling via a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactS: Renders the contact section with location info, email details, and the contact form.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Provides the site footer with branding, social links, contact options, and a WhatsApp CTA.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Displays the hero banner with main title, tagline, and CTAs including TripAdvisor.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Composes the main landing page with background image, hero, offers, reviews, contact, and footer sections.
frontend/src/components/landing/OffersSe: Displays a grid of six tour feature cards linking to offer pages with animated styling.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewCa: Renders a single review with star rating, excerpt, and reviewer name.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewsS: Shows a reviews section using curated reviews and includes a TripAdvisor CTA button.
frontend/src/components/landing/TripAdvi: Provides a styled external link button directing users to the TripAdvisor review page.
frontend/src/components/offers/GetInTouc: A CTA link component that routes to the homepage and scrolls to the contact section.
frontend/src/content/countryCallingCodes: Exports a list of country calling code options used for phone number selection.
frontend/src/content/curatedReviews.ts: Contains hardcoded curated customer reviews with ratings and excerpts.
frontend/src/content/offersPosts.ts: Defines structured offer post content including metadata and multi-section text for each tour type.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrapAcce: Handles admin bootstrap logic using username/password and refreshes admin queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminContactSubmis: Provides hooks to fetch normal and junk contact submissions with admin access handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth, handling login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageSeo.ts: React hook that sets page title, meta tags, Open Graph/Twitter tags, canonical links, and optional JSON-LD schema.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecaptchaV3.ts: Empty placeholder file for a future reCAPTCHA v3 hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollToHashSectio: Scrolls smoothly to the element matching the URL hash whenever the hash changes.
Uses React Query to submit contact form data via backend actor and refresh related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining CSS variables, themes, typography, and utility classes including text shadows.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ContactSubmissi: Admin page showing normal and junk contact submissions with authentication, tab switching, and detail viewing.
frontend/src/pages/offers/ChooseYourOwnA: Renders the Choose Your Own Adventure offer page with SEO tags, styled article content, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/FlexibleAsHell: Renders the Flexible As Hell offer page with SEO setup, structured article content, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/OffTheBeatenPa: Renders the Off the Beaten Path offer page using post data, SEO setup, and styled article sections with a CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/PrivateAndPers: Displays the Private and Personal offer page with SEO config, dynamic post content, and a call‑to‑action section.
frontend/src/pages/offers/StayYourWayPag: Shows the Stay Your Way offer page, pulling structured post content and applying SEO and themed layout components.
frontend/src/pages/offers/StoriesAndBant: Provides the Stories and Banter offer page with SEO metadata, post-driven article rendering, and a CTA footer.
frontend/src/types/recaptcha.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for future reCAPTCHA type definitions.
frontend/src/utils/formatTimestamp.ts: Converts a bigint nanosecond timestamp to a human-readable localized date string.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query strings and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and theme settings with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state, architectural notes, issues, and feature requests for persistent contact form storage and a protected admin messages page.
